main event: A sergeant in the U.S. Air Force observed a light in the sky that appeared to be round and white in color, moving slowly with a pulsating or flashing action.
interesting points: The light was approximately 40 degrees above the horizon and was visible for approximately 5-7 minutes.
The report contains sketches depicting the object's path and position, but no actual photograph.
The report suggests the object was possibly a military aircraft conducting some type of operation or maneuver.
The witness reported the sighting to local colleagues at his camp.
The witness was unsure of what the object was and did not want to speculate on the cause.
result: Probable military aircraft, possibly satellite, possibly unknown
sighted object: A round, white light in the sky
witnesses: A sergeant in the U.S. Air Force
photographs: No, the report includes sketches but no photographs
